posts.title: 配环境时那些奇怪的报错
posts.text: 1. ImportError: cannot import name ‘NoReturn’python3.6下使用pip时报错： 1234567891011121314Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/bin/pip", line 6, in <module> from pip._internal.cli.main import main File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/_internal/cli/main.py", line 9, in <module> from pip._internal.cli.autocompletion import autocomplete File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/_internal/cli/autocompletion.py", line 10, in <module> from pip._internal.cli.main_parser import create_main_parser File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/_internal/cli/main_parser.py", line 8, in <module> from pip._internal.cli import cmdoptions File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/_internal/cli/cmdoptions.py", line 30, in <module> from pip._internal.utils.hashes import STRONG_HASHES File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/_internal/utils/hashes.py", line 2, in <module> from typing import TYPE_CHECKING, BinaryIO, Dict, Iterator, List, NoReturnImportError: cannot import name 'NoReturn' 解决方法：重装python版本，从3.6.0更换为3.6.5（没有试过3.6的其他版本） 1conda install python==3.6.5 再次使用pip时会有以下警告，但是好歹能用了。 12345678WARNING: Value for scheme.headers does not match. Please report this to <https://github.com/pypa/pip/issues/9617>distutils: /home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/include/python3.6m/UNKNOWNsysconfig: /home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/DSFD_env/include/python3.6mWARNING: Additional context:user = Falsehome = Noneroot = Noneprefix = None 2. import torch报错python==3.6.0 pytorch==1.8.0 import torch报错 123 File "/home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 196, in <module> from torch._C import *ImportError: /home/wangyatian/miniconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libtorch_python.so: undefined symbol: PySlice_Unpack 将python版本改为3.6.3即可

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
